title: Taliyah W should work on her self also
body: if taliyah can have enemy trown up then  she should  have it to her self also

replies.body:
We considered this but ultimately chose not to go for it. Two reasons:

1) This would make her even MORE like Ziggs ;P

2) If W becomes a guaranteed safety tool, eventually good Taliyah players would be discouraged from using the ability offensively (because always being able to survive is so much more valuable).

Nah, I gotta disagree with it. Dont get me wrong, but for first one: Its nothing like Ziggs! Ziggs puts down a bomb which he can detonate manually and has to position himself. Taliyah will have a fraction over a second that will clearly depend on which way the vector is. Against a Yasuo, and i'd say he should be able to ult (come on its a flippin knock up. whats better than that for yasuo. it can also be a weakness for that long looked nerf to her.) On the second one: They are pretty much forced to use this ability OFFENSIVELY! because of the so famous W-E combo. If they use it to escape, it barely becomes any useful for them to inflict any damage to the enemy. They might use it to dodge certain enemy attacks that are very slow, but that cd on it should pay them for their full combo. Hope u see this. AND NO OFFENCE to u zenon. u still my g.

Hopefully these changes make her fun. I think her skills alright but her personality/character is very bland. In fact I might call her the most boring champ in all of league at the moment.

Try to keep making fun and unique champs like bard or Sol. Don't think we havd room for bland characters like Talia in our game. Esp not these days.

Think the w , e could been way better if you didn't just copy zigs. Try to come up with fun abilities like her q. 

Thanks gl
Riot thought about implementing this, but if I recall correctly, they decided this would probably make her a bit too much like Ziggs.
That would be busted. Even though ziggs can throw his while moving, even if it didn't cross terrain, it's still a cheap and useful escape tool that an already mobile champ doesn't need more of
